TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BuildPropertyGroup extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件可以代表專案中或虛擬屬性，例如全域屬性或環境變數的屬性集合中的項目。A object can represent a element in the project, or a virtual collection of properties, such as global properties or environment variable properties. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並使用方法，將內容加入至專案。The following example creates a object and uses the method to add content to the project. ， ，和類別用來新增、 移除及變更專案中的項目。The , , and classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project. param.span: 若要建立 的深層複本則為 ，否則為 。

summary.span: 建立 的深層複本 (Deep Copy) 或淺層複本 (Shallow Copy)。

span.span: Creates a deep or shallow copy of the .
A copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 淺層複本參考與原始的相同屬性群組。A shallow copy of a references the same property group as the original. 淺層複本將會反映在這兩個複本的修改。Modifications a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies. 深層複本建立新的 XML 項目參考，讓這兩份可以個別修改。A deep copy of a creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the can be independently modified. 如果直接對應到專案中的項目 (而不是對應至集合的虛擬屬性，例如環境變數和全域屬性)、 深度只允許複製。If the corresponds directly to a element in the project (rather than corresponding to a collection of virtual properties, such as environment variable and global properties), only deep copies are allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓呼叫端使用`foreach`C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` Visual Basic 中) 來逐一查看個別中的物件。This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) to iterate through the individual objects in the . ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並使用， ，和列出所有項目和屬性在專案中的類別。The following example creates a object and uses the , , and classes to list all the items and properties in the project.
